name: The Cube (itch) (Rhm81)
description:
New Update v1.4.1.2 -

Added a new Gun FAF-1EG

Added Health Bar so that you dont get 1 shoted by turrets.

Added stats now you can check how many kills,deaths you have

Added Difficultys

Removed fake save button in main menu

fixed some bugs

The boss is now much easier to kill. it is even easy on Epic Gamer Difficulty

this is a game made by a 11 year old who is a dumb piece of sh*t and barely knows anything about programing. this game contains a lot, I mean really a lot bugs and issues. definitely the worst game you have every played. if you find any bugs or issues or game breaking issues please report it. I probably wont be able to fix it but I will try my best to fix it.
